price: Na hakuna siri katika mbingu na ardhi ila imo katika Kitabu kinacho bainisha.
arabic: وَمَا مِنۡ غَآئِبَةٖ فِي ٱلسَّمَآءِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ إِلَّا فِي كِتَٰبٖ مُّبِينٍ
footnotes: Na hapana kilicho fichikana cha ghaibu, na kiwe kidogo vipi au duni, mbinguni au katika ardhi ila Mwenyezi Mungu anakijua, na amekidhibiti katika Kitabu cha Haki kilioko kwake.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wamā min ghāibatin fī al-samāi wal-arḍi illā fī kitābin mubīnin
